data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: A number of dishes have been part of Cantonese cuisine since the earliest territorial establishments of Guangdong. While ____ of ____ are ____ the ____ of ____ Cantonese ____, ____ simpler ____ are ____ commonly ____ in ____ homes. Home-made Cantonese dishes are usually served with plain white rice.
data.partBlankContent: A number of dishes have been part of Cantonese cuisine since the earliest territorial establishments of Guangdong. While ma__ of th___ are o_ the me___ of typ____ Cantonese resta______, so__ simpler on__ are mo__ commonly fo___ in Chi____ homes. Home-made Cantonese dishes are usually served with plain white rice.
data.answer: 自广东最早建立领土以来，许多菜肴已经成为粤菜的一部分。虽然这些菜单中有许多是典型的粤菜餐馆的菜单，但一些简单的菜单在中国家庭中更常见。家常粤菜通常搭配白米饭。
